      • classContains

        public boolean classContains(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element,
                             String value)
        Checks if given web element css class contains given value.
        Parameters:
        element - WebElement which css class will be examined.
        value - string value which method will look for.
        Returns:
        true if css class contains given value.

        public boolean isConditionMet(org.openqa.selenium.support.ui.ExpectedCondition condition)
        Checks if ExpectedCondition given in method parameter is met in small timeout (5 seconds)
        Parameters:
        condition - ExpectedCondition instance that will be examined.
        Returns:
        true if the condition is met without violating the timeout.

      • verifyPostAjax

        public void verifyPostAjax(org.openqa.selenium.support.ui.ExpectedCondition condition)
        Verifies that author mode is loaded (author loader is hidden) and then verifies if given condition is met in medium timeout (15 seconds)
        Parameters:
        condition - condition that has to be met

      • optionalWait

        public Object optionalWait(org.openqa.selenium.support.ui.ExpectedCondition<org.openqa.selenium.WebElement> condition)
        Methods examine if condition is met in small timeout (5 seconds), if not nothing happens.
        Parameters:
        condition - condition that has to be met.
        Returns:
        object or null.

      • elementReady

        public org.openqa.selenium.WebElement elementReady(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element)
        Checks if a WebElement is ready to be operated on, ie. is visible and not stale and returns that element.
        Parameters:
        element - WebElement to be checked
        Returns:
        checked element

      • staleSafe

        public <T> T staleSafe(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element,
                       WebElementCallable<T> elementCallable)
        Wraps a WebElement's method - executes it in a StaleReferenceElementException-safe way.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of the returned value
        Parameters:
        element - element from which method will be invoked
        elementCallable - method to be wrapped
        Returns:
        result from the called method

      • hasAttributeWithValue

        public boolean hasAttributeWithValue(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element,
                                     String attribute,
                                     String value)
        Examines if element has attribute value like one passed in parameter.
        Parameters:
        element - WebElement instance that is going to be examined.
        attribute - attribute which value will be tested.
        value - expected value of the element attribute
        Returns:
        true if the element has attribute value like one passed in parameter.
